summary: Changes the sky textures to bring out detail, make visuals more immersive, cinematic, and somewhat painterly.
descriptionHtml:
How to install:

Extract the data folder to your skyrim main directory. After that, start the game. 

For best results: Use an ENB mod. 

What does this mod do?

This mod improves the colors and look of the sky textures in skyrim. 


	-sky looks bluer 
	-stormclouds look more dark and sinister
	-gives clouds more of a cinematic, painterly feel
	-adds color variation to normal clouds ( i added a slight pink/blue tint to them)
        -added contrast and vibrance to bring out the detail of the texture 
        -added some variation to the sky color to make it seem less like you are on Earth (this is kind of a WIP) 

Eventually, I will create a high resolution version and a sunglare texture to go along with it, but for now, enjoy this. 

I told myself I wouldn\'t do this. If you like the file please endorse it. It really helps. Thanks :D
author: xseph1rothx
